changeSet.author: Clément Bareth
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM meveo_script_instance_script_instance rel WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM meveo_script_instance WHERE id = rel.child_script_instance_id) OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM meveo_script_instance WHERE id = rel.script_instance_id)

changeSet.id: #531 - Add cascade delete for child script
changeSet.author: Clément Bareth

changeSet.id: #550 - Country should also contain a flag to identify a country being active or inactive and requires some changes.
